name: EcoTech Energy
description: EcoTech Energy is a pioneering initiative focused on integrating energy efficiency solutions in industrial processes. It involves the development of smart energy monitoring and control systems, aiming at sustainability and innovation.

members.name: Yoko Takano
members.description: Responsible for developing innovative energy efficiency solutions.

members.name: Filipe Deschamps
members.description: Coordinates all stages of the project, ensuring timely delivery.

name: Advanced Industry 4.0
description: Advanced Industry 4.0 focuses on elevating industrial automation to new heights. It involves implementing cyber-physical systems, IoT, and big data analysis to transform the industrial production chain, enhancing efficiency and digitalization.

members.name: Bullas Attekita
members.description: Leads the development and integration of IoT solutions in the industrial environment.

members.name: Lucas Montano
members.description: Analyzes large volumes of data to optimize production processes.
